data_table.description: Mini-Mental State Exam Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Mini-Mental State Exam Form]

variable.name: MME1
variable.description: Q1. Answer to naming year [Mini-Mental State Exam Form]
